mapper.insert: insert into upp_database ( database_id, database_type_cd, database_name, database_desc, server_addr, connect_str, char_encoding, access_port, test_user_name, test_user_password ) values ( #{database_id}, #{database_type_cd}, #{database_name}, #{database_desc}, #{server_addr}, #{connect_str}, #{char_encoding}, #{access_port}, #{test_user_name}, #{test_user_password} )
mapper.select: select a.database_id, a.database_type_cd, a.database_name, a.database_desc, a.server_addr, a.connect_str, a.access_port, a.test_user_name, a.test_user_password from upp_database a where a.database_id = #{database_id}
mapper.update: update upp_database a set a.database_type_cd = #{database_type_cd}, a.database_name = #{database_name}, a.database_desc = #{database_desc}, a.server_addr = #{server_addr}, a.connect_str = #{connect_str}, a.char_encoding = #{char_encoding}, a.access_port = #{access_port}, a.test_user_name = #{test_user_name jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a.test_user_password = #{test_user_password jdbcType=VARCHAR} where a.database_id = #{database_id}
